header.title: OTP_Mibs Release Notes

chapter.p: This document describes the changes made to the OTP_Mibs application.

item.p: Tuple funs (a two-element tuple with a module name and a function) are now officially deprecated and will be removed in R16. Use 'fun M:F/A' instead. To make you aware that your system uses tuple funs, the very first time a tuple fun is applied, a warning will be sent to the error logger.
The documentation is now built with open source tools (xsltproc and fop) that exists on most platforms. One visible change is that the frames are removed.
The copyright notices have been updated.
Replaced calls to deprecated functions in snmp with calls to the equivalent functions in snmpa.
The otp_mib module has been cleaned up to improve the maintainability. It should have no effect on the functionality of the OTP_Mibs application.

section.title: OTP_Mibs 1.0
section.p: The OTP mibs that where included in the SASL application have been moved to this new application OTP_Mibs. The OTP mibs had no real connection to SASL and it is desirable that the core of Erlang/OTP is not dependent on SNMP.
